tier.item: (1) Kanan-qa marka-man aywa-na-yki-pa ranti-n-mi papa-kuna-ta alla-shun-na
now-TOP town-GOAL go-NOM-2PERS-GEN trade-3PERS-EVID potato-PLUR-OBJ dig-12FUT-NOW
`Today, instead of you going to town, we will harvest potatoes.'
